attributes.action: reject the pre-budget report of November 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The pre-budget report will damage this country far more than the current recession.

Increasing fuel duty and national insurance will increase costs for every citizen in the UK as well as national debt for no benefit whatsoever.

After reading through the pre-budget report details, it would seem wiser to do nothing than to implement this plan which will more than likely bankrupt the UK.
